description:
Batzz has until sunset to help people and cure Gao`s dragonification. As Gao begins to fade out of existence, Baku discovers that the X Tempest Buster card has gone missing, leading to a desperate search.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Time Limit! Kiba-ou ga Shoumetsu Suru Hi!!
Time Limit! The Day that Gao Stops Existing!
タイムリミット! 牙王が消滅する日!!
